Text: ISDAs Annual Primary Contact Update ISDA International Swaps and Derivatives Association Inc Fifth Avenue th Floor Rockefeller Center New York NY United States of America Telephone Facsimile email website wwwisdaorg November Dear Mr Mark Haedicke We are updating our database to ensure that important member information is directed to the appropriate contacts We have listed the primary and legal opinion contacts from your institution If the information is incorrect incomplete or if the contacts have changed please indicate in the space provided below Primary Contact CONTACT Mr Mark Haedicke TITLE Managing Director Gen Couns FIRM Enron Corporation ADDRESS Smith Street Houston TX United States PHONE FAX EMAIL Legal Opinion Contact CONTACT Mr Mark Taylor TITLE Assistant General Counsel FIRM Enron Corporation ADDRESS Smith Street EB Houston TX United States PHONE FAX EMAIL If you would like ISDA to have a link from our website wwwisdaorg to yours please provide us with your website address Website Address Print name Signature Date Please return this form to my attention by December by fax at or email to Thank you Barbara Hanlon Database Administrator

Important Notice Reply RequestedISDA International Swaps and Derivatives Association Inc Fifth Avenue th Floor Rockefeller Center New York NY United States of America Telephone Facsimile email website wwwisdaorg July IMPORTANT NOTICE Reply Requested MEMORANDUM TO ISDA MEMBERS ISDA is in the process of updating its records to ensure that we have the most current information for members in our database To continue with its electronic initiatives that began last year ISDA will increasingly provide information notices comment letters committee meeting notices and other correspondence by email or through its web site In addition ISDA plans to enhance its web site to allow members to customize their view of the web site so they can select the information that is most relevant to them More details on this enhanced web feature will follow later this year Your correct details particularly your email address are required in order for you to remain informed of ISDA initiatives and developments in the derivatives industry ISDA committees are the principal means of informing members of developments in areas of their responsibility or interest Careful consideration should be given to the list of committees attached before you make your selection If you do not respond to this request or if you do not indicate that you wish to be on an ISDA committee you will not receive notices on ISDA committee activities You will continue to receive the ISDA newsletter and conference information only Enclosed are the details we have on file for you Please confirm that your details are correct or make changes if necessary and reply by email to by July Please contact Barbara Hanlon by email at or by telephone on should you have any question Robert Pickel Executive Director and Chief Executive Officer IMAGE new york london singapore tokyo Please review the following details and reply by email to or by fax on Current Information Change To Salutation Mr First Name Jeffrey K Last Name Skilling Firm Enron Corporation Title President Ceo Address Smith Street Address EB City State Zip Houston TX Country USA Phone Fax EMail Please indicate the committees that you would like to join from the list below A complete description of each committee is available from the ISDA web site Accounting Committee Asia Pacific Committee Canada Committee Central Eastern Europe Committee Collateral Committee Credit Derivatives Market Practice Cmt Documentation Committee Energy and Developing Products Equity Derivatives Committee Euro Committee Japan Committee Operations Committee Latin America Committee Regulatory Committee Risk Management Committee Tax Committee Trading Practice Committee
